Key Match Events: The Suns benefited from a controversial loose ball foul that rewarded Jusuf Nurkic with a game-winning free throw.
Luka Doncic missed a crucial open three-pointer with two minutes left that would have put the Mavericks up by five.
Post-Match Reflections: The Mavericks were disappointed with their performance, particularly their offensive rebounding issues and three-point shooting.
Spencer Dinwiddie's clutch minutes were questioned after Naji Marshall's strong performance was taken out of the lineup late in the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks are struggling with three-point shooting, shooting 11/33 from deep in this game.
The team's offensive rebounding issues and defensive lapses were costly in the final minutes.
